metas.name: Wild Kratts
metas.description: Like Ada Twist and Magic School Bus, this show combines science and adventure in an animated format.

metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Similar to Doc McStuffins and Peg + Cat, it's a gentle, educational show focused on social-emotional learning.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: An animated series that promotes literacy and cultural understanding, akin to WordGirl's educational elements.

metas.name: Sid the Science Kid
metas.description: Focuses on science concepts for young children, similar to Ada Twist and The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Octonauts
metas.description: An animated show that explores marine biology and teamwork, appealing to fans of Special Agent Oso's problem-solving and educational nature.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: A gentle, visually rich animated series that encourages exploration and learning, similar to Curious George.

metas.name: Sarah & Duck
metas.description: A charming animated show with a whimsical approach to learning and everyday experiences, reminiscent of Bluey's gentle humor.

metas.name: Puffin Rock
metas.description: A beautifully animated, gentle show about nature and family, appealing to fans of Bluey and Clifford.

metas.name: Ask the StoryBots
metas.description: Animated educational show that answers kids' questions about the world, much like Ada Twist and The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Esme & Roy
metas.description: Animated series about two young monster babysitters who help young children overcome challenges, with a focus on emotional development.

metas.name: Pocoyo
metas.description: Minimalist animation with a focus on simple concepts and fun, similar to the early learning aspects of Peg + Cat.

metas.name: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
metas.description: An animated show that uses the iconic character to teach science concepts, similar to The Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Splash and Bubbles
metas.description: Animated series exploring marine life and friendships, with educational undertones like Octonauts.

metas.name: If You Give a Mouse a Cookie
metas.description: Animated series based on the popular book series, with gentle humor and life lessons.

metas.name: Oswald
metas.description: A gentle animated show about a friendly octopus and his friends, focusing on kindness and problem-solving.

metas.name: Bo on the Go!
metas.description: An animated show where a young girl and her dragon companion solve problems, similar to Special Agent Oso.

metas.name: T.U.F.F. Puppy
metas.description: Animated action-comedy about a dog who is a secret agent, with humor and adventure like WordGirl but less intense.

metas.name: Tilly and Friends
metas.description: Animated series focused on friendship, feelings, and everyday adventures, appealing to the gentle nature of Bluey.

metas.name: The Fixies
metas.description: Animated show where tiny creatures live inside machines and help fix them, focusing on science and engineering.

metas.name: Ready Jet Go!
metas.description: Animated series that encourages kids to explore space and science, a good follow-up to Magic School Bus and Ada Twist.

metas.name: Rhyme Time Town
metas.description: Animated series that uses songs and rhymes to teach early literacy and problem-solving.

metas.name: Blue's Clues & You!
metas.description: Interactive animated show that encourages critical thinking and problem-solving, a gentle option for younger viewers.

metas.name: The Wubbulous World of Dr. Seuss
metas.description: Live-action and puppetry with animation, based on classic Dr. Seuss stories, offering gentle humor and imagination.

metas.name: Lily's Driftwood Bay
metas.description: Stop-motion animated series about a girl who collects treasures and has adventures, with a whimsical feel.

metas.name: Dot.
metas.description: An animated series that showcases a curious girl's adventures and her use of technology to learn about the world.

metas.name: Pip and Posy
metas.description: Animated series about two best friends and their adventures, focusing on sharing and kindness, similar to Bluey.

metas.name: Go Jetters
metas.description: Animated series that teaches children about geography and landmarks around the world.

metas.name: Little Bear
metas.description: A gentle, classic animated series about a young bear and his family, emphasizing love and learning.

metas.name: Dino Dana
metas.description: Live-action series about a girl who studies dinosaurs, blending science with adventure like Magic School Bus.

metas.name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum
metas.description: Animated series that teaches kids about historical figures through time travel.

metas.name: The Ollie & Moon Show
metas.description: Animated series about two feline friends who travel the world and learn about different cultures.

metas.name: Chirp
metas.description: Animated show about three bird friends who embark on adventures and learn about the natural world.

metas.name: Wallykazam!
metas.description: Animated series that uses magic and creativity to teach early literacy skills.
